name: Stickman Legends
summary: Stickman Legends is an offline free-to-play shadow fighting stickman game, which is a great combination of action game, role-playing game (RPG), and player versus player (PvP). Dive into the epic shadow battle and enjoy the dark fantasy of war as you have to fight against cruel enemies, evil monsters and mighty bosses.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Stickman Legends: Ninja Warrior - Shadow of War 2
